MajorClaims.MC1: creative artists must be given the freedom to express their ideas without any restrictions
MajorClaims.MC2: artists should be given the freedom of expression

Claims.C1: Creativity originates in a free mind
Claims.C2: Creative works help to create social awareness by giving a social message
Claims.C3: innovative works makes people realize things in a peaceful way and peep into their own conscience
Claims.C4: Like the media, artists should also be given the freedom to express their ideas freely
Claims.C5: Mind can not work when it is chained in boundaries
Claims.C6: Imagination is at its best when the mind is relaxed and free from the fear of government or any restrictive laws
Claims.C7: Artists should have self-awareness not to create vulgar, hurtful or useless works which do not serve any purpose

Premises.P1: Time and again, creative artists like Michaelangelo, Picasso, Salman Rushdie, Shakespeare etc. have made artistic works which gave a social message
Premises.P2: Right from sculptures to paintings, books to drama and movies, all these artistic works have reflected the contemporary social issues of different eras
Premises.P3: It helps to raise issues and criticize the wrong doings of the governments
Premises.P4: Bangladeshi writer Taslima Nasrin was accused of acting against the government, just because she raised a social issue
Premises.P5: This type of approach is a hurdle in promoting creative minds
Premises.P7: Frank Zappa once said, "Mind is like a parachute, it doesn't work if its not open“
Premises.P8: Restrictions would just curb the innovative ideas of the artists and would limit their brains
Premises.P9: artists should also know not to hurt the sentiments of the people
Premises.P10: Many artists have been involved in controversies because of hurting the religious or social beliefs of the common people
